title: Aztec Ruins National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Looking for more information? Explore these pages to learn more.  News  Browse news releases, subscribe to updates, and discover archived news.  Photos & Multimedia Take a Virtual Tour of Aztec Ruins, or browse through photos of ancestral Pueblo architecture and artifacts.  History & Culture  Learn about the people that built and lived here, and Ask an Archeologist your questions.  Nature A variety of habitats exist in this place. The river and historic ditches played a big part in ancestral Pueblo life and for more recent settlers.  Education Is the place for teachers to plan a field trip, request a guest speaker and find our free curriculum.  Kids &Youth Become a Junior Ranger online - complete activities to earn a patch!  Management Learn about the management plan, laws and policies of the monument today and in the past.  Bookstore Find resources and online ordering information in the Western National Park Association store.  Brochures  Download handouts on ceramics, dendrochronology, native plants and more!
